price: ايا كله چې موږ مړه او خاورې شو (نو دوهم ځل به بيا را ژوندي كېږو؟) دا بېرته راګرځيدل خو (له پوهې) لرې دي.
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
